text: Ronald Lawrence Abrams (born April 27, 1952) is an American politician in the state of Minnesota. He served in the Minnesota House of Representatives from 1989–2002 and 2003–2006.https://www.leg.state.mn.us/legdb/fulldetail?ID=10004 ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:University of Minnesota alumni Category:Harvard Law School alumni Category:Minnesota Republicans Category:Members of the Minnesota House of Representatives
title: Ron Abrams
